sense.name: 影响, influence
sense.commentary: The power to have an effect on people or things, or someone or something having such power.
sense.examples:
社会影响 social influence
他的作品受到东方思想影响. His works were under Eastern influence.
你能用你的影响帮我找一份工作吗? Will you use your influence to get me a job?

sense.name: 影响, 印象, impression,
sense.commentary: Effect on the way someone feels or thinks.
sense.examples:
这会给人坏影响(印象) This would create a bad impression.
你去面试晚到会给人坏影响(印象). It makes a bad impression if you're late for an interview.
你的所有警告对他影响不大. All your warnings made little impression on him.
